author: Story by Tamara Hardingham-Gill and video by Temujin Doran
title: Hiker stranded on deserted island by virus
description: Homeless and unable to continue his 8,700-mile trek along Britain's coast, Christian Lewis has found himself in arguably the safest place to sit out the coronavirus crisis -- a deserted island in the middle of the North Atlantic.
content:
Story by Tamara Hardingham-Gill and video by Temujin Doran Updated 21st April 2020
(CNN) What happens when you're nearly three years into the middle of a 8,700 mile hike, you've given up your home, you have no money -- and then coronavirus stops the world in… [+9981 chars]
